column5: Hey guys, just a heads up for anyone looking for a new lowrance, or can tempt santa into getting one, cabelas has a sale on the hds 7 and others, 150$ off at 849, plus the $200 mail in rebate  http://www.cabelas.com/product/Bargain-Cave/Boating/Boating-Electronics%7C/pc/105591780/c/105767280/sc/105684480/Lowrance-HDS-7-SonarGPS/737926.uts?WTz_l=Home%3Bcat107048880%3Bcat105681780%3Bcat105684480
A few vendors have em at that price in the states. Very good deal. I paid 1000, and at the time their were no rebates available
OOOOOOOOOOOO, the one I want is on for $2600 with a $200 rebate it's only $2400. Too bad I don't have an extra gigantic pile of cash laying around.
I hear ya Drifter I would love to have a 10 on the bow it says the rebate is availible till febuary so maybe after X-mas I can get another 7 for up front
Once you get into high end units over a grand, I seem to see mostly Furuno's on Lake Ontario with Airmar transducers FWIW. out of my snack bracket though

great deal, best price I shopped so far in the States is $871.50 w/ free shipping to US address w/ no state tax  they pre-charge duties and taxes if shipped to Canada, I think it might be better to order and have it shipped to the States and pick it up, you should have a chance to get a discount on the taxes and duties
